Text:
function RYU_EP05_06()
    -- .起-4【1月第3週】「振り払われた手」
    SaveData.Title = "振り払われた手"

    -- //BG：校舎前
LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG011aa")
SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)

PLAY_BGM("BGM02.wav",0)

    MSG([[ Several days have passed since Uran Ryuguuin took a leave of absence. The impact of losing the leading figure of the conservative faction was gradually and surely spreading throughout the academy. ]])

STOP_BGM(1000)

    -- //BG：大講堂正面
LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG020aa")
SWITCH_SCREEN("mask002" , 1000,false)

    -- //SE：歓声（ＭＡＸ）
PLAY_SE("SEf001.wav",0,true)

    -- //BG：ステージ上
LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG024aa")
SWITCH_SCREEN("mask006" , 1000,false)

PLAY_BGM("BGM17.wav")

    -- //BU：アルメリア（笑顔）
LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_ARU01ea")
SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 500,false)

PLAY_VOICE("armeria_0050.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hermes】※Almeria・smile
 "Everyyone! Thank you for coming to the co-ed promotion club I’m hosting today!" ]])

LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_ARU01na")
SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 300,true)
PLAY_VOICE("armeria_0051.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hermes】※Almeria・evil grin
 "I'll explain the joys of co-ed later! For now, please enjoy my live performance to your heart’s content!" ]])

    -- //SE：歓声（ＭＡＸ）
--PLAY_SE("SEf001.wav")

LAYER_LOAD(50,"")

    -- //BG：大講堂正面
LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG020aa")
SWITCH_SCREEN("mask005" , 1000,false)
    -- //BU：リラ（苦笑・汗）
LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RIR07fa")
SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 500,false)

    MSG([[ Hermes, showered with cheers on stage. From the back corner of the auditorium, Lira and I watched, overwhelmed by the enthusiasm that exceeded the rumors. ]])

STOP_SE("SEf001.wav",1000)

PLAY_VOICE("lira_1378.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】wry smile, sweat
 "See? Like I said, after school every day, Hermes-senpai holds these live shows that double as co-ed explanation meetings." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ga")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1989.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】panic
 "Th-This is an amazing turnout." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RIR07aa")
SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 300,true)
PLAY_VOICE("lira_1379.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】normal
 "Well, if you get to see a live performance from a national idol almost every day, anyone would get pumped up." ]])

LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RIR07ea")
SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 300,true)
PLAY_VOICE("lira_1380.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】smile
 "And hey, the sound pressure is insane, right? Apparently, because the equipment’s old, it’s barely holding up against Hermes-senpai’s voice." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01fa")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1990.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】wry smile, sweat
 "Her volume is too much even for the machines. She really is an incredible person." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ I recalled how Hermes had been asking to replace the speakers every time the Four Princesses gathered. ]])

    MSG([[ On top of the already old equipment, Hermes’ current performance had her vocal power even higher than usual, almost fierce. I seriously worried the equipment might break down. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ba")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1991.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】serious
 "If I keep spending time alongside Hermes-senpai like this, it’s only a matter of time before my heart wavers toward the co-ed faction." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RIR07ba")
SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 300,true)
PLAY_VOICE("lira_1381.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】serious
 "That’s the plan, right? But still, it’s weird for Hermes-senpai to make a move promoting co-ed right when Uran-senpai is on leave." ]])

LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RIR07aa")
SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 300,true)
PLAY_VOICE("lira_1382.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】normal
 "Anyway, if this keeps up, the good anti-co-ed atmosphere we worked so hard to build will be ruined. We need to come up with some countermeasures." ]])

    MSG([[ Nodding at Lira’s words, I had already thought of the best course of action. ]])

    MSG([[ That was to have Uran Ryuguuin return to school. All the current turmoil stems from losing our leader, Uran. ]])

    MSG([[ There is no way to break this deadlock except to bring Uran back. Above all, I absolutely cannot allow Yuriai Private Academy, which she tried to protect, to be trampled during her absence. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ba")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1992.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】serious
 "According to Ouga, Uran will come tomorrow after school to officially complete her leave of absence procedures. I’ll ask her about the situation then." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("erika_1993.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】serious
 "I can’t accept a farewell like this. I have to hear the true circumstances directly from Uran herself!" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RIR07ea")
SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 300,true)
PLAY_VOICE("lira_1383.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】smile
 "So you’re making a direct approach to the captive princess. You absolutely have to get her out of the castle, Erika." ]])

    -- //SE：黄色い悲鳴
PLAY_SE("SEf008.wav")

    MSG([[ Hermes’ singing was so loud it caused feedback. The resonating BGM and cheers filled the air. ]])

    MSG([[ That familiar noise now irritated me terribly. ]])


STOP_SE("SEf008.wav",1000)
    STOP_BGM(1000)
LAYER_LOAD(50,"")

    -- 　　　　◆
LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "")
SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)
WAIT_INPUT(1000)

    -- //BG：メインストリート（冬・夕方）
LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG,"BG019bc")
SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",1000,false)

    MSG([[ Then came the fateful moment. After school had started and the night sky began blending with the sunset hues of the crimson sky―― ]])

    -- //BG：校舎前（夕方）
LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG011ba")
SWITCH_SCREEN("mask005" , 1000,false)

PLAY_BGM("BGM02.wav")

    MSG([[ I was waiting in ambush for Uran in front of the school building. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ba")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1994.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】serious
 "――She’s here." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    -- //BU：モブ男性、ウラン・私服・通常
SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",0,false)
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RYU01aa")
LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_MOB12aa")
LAYER_ALPHA(50,0)
LAYER_ALPHA(55,0)
LAYER_POSITION(50,800,0)
LAYER_POSITION(55,300,0)
LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(50,600,0,500,Ease.OutSine)
LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(55,100,0,500,Ease.OutSine)
LAYER_MOVE_ALPHA(50,255,500,Ease.OutSine)
LAYER_MOVE_ALPHA(55,255,500,Ease.OutSine)
WAIT(500)

    MSG([[ Uran approached the school along the main street with a sturdy man in a suit. ]])

    MSG([[ The man beside her was likely her father. Hanado Ryuguuin, head of the Ryuguuin family. ]])

    MSG([[ Muscular even through the suit, shaved head. His dignified presence and steady steps seemed to confirm his solid stance. ]])

    MSG([[ He looked like the ideal strong man I had once aspired to be. ]])

    MSG([[ It was clear at a glance he would not be an easy opponent. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ba")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1995.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】serious
 (I have to find a way to make a moment alone with Uran...) ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
LAYER_LOAD(55,"")
LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG011be")
LAYER_SCALE(LAYER_BG,200,200)
LAYER_POSITION(LAYER_BG,2800,1000)

    -- //BU：オウガ（通常）
LAYER_LOAD(50,"BUL_OGA01aa")
LAYER_POSITION(50,0,0)
SWITCH_SCREEN("mask006" , 500,false)

PLAY_VOICE("ogre_0406.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Ouga】normal
 "Alright. As planned, I’ll distract Mr. Ryuguuin. Erika, please try to persuade him." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ba")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1996.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】serious
 "Yes. Thank you, Ouga." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    -- //BU：なし
SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",0,false)
LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(50,200,0,500,Ease.InSine)
LAYER_MOVE_ALPHA(50,0,500,Ease.InSine)
WAIT(500)
LAYER_LOAD(50,"")

    MSG([[ Ouga left me and headed toward Uran and the man. ]])

LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG011ba")
    -- //BU：モブ男性、ウラン・私服（通常）
LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RYU01aa")
LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_MOB12aa")
LAYER_POSITION(50,600,0)
LAYER_POSITION(55,100,0)
SWITCH_SCREEN("mask005" , 500,false)

LAYER_LOAD(60,"BU_OGA01ea")
LAYER_ALPHA(60,0)
LAYER_POSITION(60,-800,0)
LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(60,-600,0,500,Ease.OutSine)
LAYER_MOVE_ALPHA(60,255,500,Ease.OutSine)
WAIT(500)

PLAY_VOICE("ogre_0407.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Ouga】smile
 "Long time no see, Mr. Ryuguuin." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("udoh_0001.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hanado Ryuguuin】
 "Ah, Ouga. Were you waiting for us to arrive?" ]])

LAYER_LOAD(60,"BU_OGA01aa")
LAYER_POSITION(60,-600,0)
SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 300,true)
PLAY_VOICE("ogre_0408.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Ouga】smile
 "Yeah. I talk to Uran regularly, but it’s been a while since I last spoke to you." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("ogre_0409.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Ouga】normal
 "If it’s alright, I’d like to show you the boys' school building where the boys’ division usually gathers. It won’t take more than ten minutes." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("udoh_0002.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hanado Ryuguuin】
 "Haha, that’s easy enough. Uran, I’m going with Ouga to see the boys’ division, so you go ahead and enter the building first." ]])

    -- //BU：ウラン・私服（通常）
LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RYU01aa")
LAYER_POSITION(50,600,0)
SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0839.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】casual・normal
 "Yes. Understood, Father." ]])

    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",0,false)
LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(55,-100,0,500,Ease.OutSine)
LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(60,-800,0,500,Ease.OutSine)
LAYER_MOVE_ALPHA(55,0,500,Ease.OutSine)
LAYER_MOVE_ALPHA(60,0,500,Ease.OutSine)
WAIT(500)
LAYER_LOAD(55,"")
LAYER_LOAD(60,"")

    MSG([[ The plan succeeded. The man went with Ouga to the boys’ division, leaving Uran alone. ]])

LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RYU01da")
LAYER_POSITION(50,600,0)
SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 300,true)
    MSG([[
    【Uran】casual・sadness
 "…………" ]])
    -- //ボイスなし

    MSG([[ Uran stopped walking, looked up at the familiar school building, her expression darkened. ]])

    MSG([[ Without exchanging words, just her expression clearly showed she still had lingering attachments. ]])

    MSG([[ ――Uran still wants to come back to the academy. There’s no way I can accept a farewell like this! ]])

STOP_BGM(2000)

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ba")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1997.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】serious
 "Uran!" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ Before I knew it, I rushed out in front of Uran. ]])

LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RYU01ga")
LAYER_POSITION(50,600,0)
SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 300,true)
PLAY_VOICE("uran_0840.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】casual・panic
 "Ha……!?" ]])

LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RYU01da")
LAYER_POSITION(50,600,0)
SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 300,true)
PLAY_VOICE("uran_0841.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】sadness
 "No……!" ]])

    -- //SE：走る音
    PLAY_SE("SEa015.wav")
    -- //BU：なし
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",0,false)
LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(50,800,0,500,Ease.InSine)
LAYER_MOVE_ALPHA(50,0,500,Ease.InSine)
WAIT(500)
LAYER_LOAD(50,"")

--WAIT(1000)

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ga")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1998.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】panic
 "U-Uran!?" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ Uran turned her back and ran away, as if rejecting me. ]])

    -- //BG：メインストリート（冬・夕方）
LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG,"BG019bc")
SWITCH_SCREEN("mask029",1000,false)

PLAY_BGM("BGM06.wav")

    MSG([[ I hurriedly chased after her. Dashing through the crimson main street, I finally managed to grasp Uran’s slender arm. ]])

    -- //CI：152
LAYER_LOAD(55,"CI152a")
LAYER_POSITION(55,1000,0)
LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(55,0,0,500,Ease.InSine)
SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,false)
--SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",1000,false)

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01bb")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1999.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】serious
 "P-Please don’t go, Uran! I want to hear you out!" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0842.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】casual・sadness
 "I-It hurts…!" ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ga")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_2000.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】panic
 "I-I'm sorry…!" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    -- //CI：なし
LAYER_LOAD(55,"")
SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,false)

LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RYU01da")
SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,false)

    MSG([[ I think I held on too tightly. I quickly released her arm and bowed deeply in apology. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01da")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_2001.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】sadness
 "Uran, is it true that you’re taking a leave of absence from Yuriai Private Academy?" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0843.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】casual・sadness
 "...It is true." ]])

    MSG([[ Hearing Uran’s direct confirmation, I felt a little shocked. ]])

    MSG([[ But I couldn’t back down. I had to honestly convey my feelings to Uran no matter what. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ga")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_2002.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】panic
 "W-Why? Didn’t we promise to be together until graduation?" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ Uran replied with a single line: “That is the will of the Ryuguuin family,” then lowered her head. It was as if she had already given up on everything. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ga")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_2004.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】panic
 "T-The will of the Ryuguuin family...? Is it true that this leave of absence is an order from your father?" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0844.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】casual・sadness
 "Yes. That is true as well." ]])

    MSG([[ Uran answered as if it were someone else’s problem. Feeling a strange discomfort at this uncharacteristic response, I continued to try to persuade her. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01da")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_2005.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】sadness
 "Since you left, Yuriai Private Academy is now seeing a revival of the co-ed faction, spurred by Hermes’ fierce promotion." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("erika_2006.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】sadness
 "If you don’t come back, we’ll never be able to protect Yuriai’s traditions." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ba")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_2007.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】serious
 "More than anything, the academy is very lonely without you. Please, come back again." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ Uran quietly listened. After I had said all I wanted to, a silence fell. ]])

    MSG([[ Before I realized it, the sky had completely darkened to twilight, and Uran’s face was too shadowed to see clearly. ]])

    MSG([[ Just as I was about to step closer to see better―― ]])

LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RYU01aa")
SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)
PLAY_VOICE("uran_0845.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】casual・normal
 "Then... please answer one question from me as well." ]])


    STOP_BGM(1000)
SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",0,false)
LAYER_LOAD(60,"BG019bg")
LAYER_LOAD(61,"BG019cg")
LAYER_POSITION(60,-900,-300)
LAYER_POSITION(61,-900,-300)
LAYER_ALPHA(61,0)
LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(60,900,-300,30000,Ease.InSine)
LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(61,900,-300,30000,Ease.InSine)
SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",1000,false)

LAYER_MOVE_ALPHA(61,255,1500,Ease.Liner)
WAIT_INPUT(2000)

    -- //BG：メインストリート（冬・夜）
--LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG,"BG019cc")
--SWITCH_SCREEN("mask008",1000,false)

    MSG([[ The sunset disappeared fully, and darkness enveloped the main street. ]])



    LAYER_LOAD(60,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(61,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG,"BG019cc")
LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RYU01ba")
SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",1000,false)

PLAY_BGM("BGM09.wav")

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0846.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】casual・serious
 "Erika, is it true that your real gender is male?" ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ca")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_2008.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】surprise
 "...Huh?" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ My thoughts froze. ]])

    MSG([[ Unable to think or speak. ]])

    MSG([[ By the time my mind started moving again, it was already too late. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0847.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】casual・serious
 "Silence will be taken as confirmation." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ga")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_2009.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】panic
 "W-Wait! I haven’t said anything yet!" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0848.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】casual・serious
 "The strength with which you grabbed me earlier was hardly that of a woman. Your performance during the Princess Election, and your success in physical education make sense if you consider you as male." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0849.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】casual・serious
 "The day before the Princess Election, I saw you heading to the restroom on your way home... Were you not removing makeup and returning to your true face?" ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01da")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_2010.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】sadness
 "T-That is..." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RYU01aa")
SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)
PLAY_VOICE("uran_0850.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】casual・normal
 "I don’t want to doubt you either. When my father told me, I didn’t want to believe it. I tried to deny it many times." ]])

LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RYU01da")
SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)
PLAY_VOICE("uran_0851.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】casual・sadness
 "But the more I think about it, the more it makes sense. The evidence that makes me question your gender just keeps coming up." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ga")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_2011.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】panic
 "I, I... I’m..." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ Uran looked at me with tears in her eyes. Her moist eyes pleaded silently, "Please deny it." ]])

    MSG([[ Uran wanted me to deny it too. I understood that. ]])

    MSG([[ I should deny it. I have to deny it. I could line up cheap excuses or whatever to deny it. ]])

    MSG([[ If I did that, surely we could go back to the way things were between us. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01da")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_2012.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】sadness
 "I, am――" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ But for some reason――I couldn’t respond. ]])

LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RYU01da")
SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)
PLAY_VOICE("uran_0852.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】casual・sadness
 "...Liar." ]])

    -- //BU：なし
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",0,false)
LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(50,200,0,500,Ease.InCubic)
LAYER_MOVE_ALPHA(50,0,500,Ease.InCubic)
WAIT(500)
LAYER_LOAD(50,"")

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ga")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_2013.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】panic
 "Uran!?" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    -- //SE：腕を振る音
PLAY_SE("SEa040.wav")
--WAIT(400)

    MSG([[ I grabbed Uran’s arm again as she ran off, but she shook my hand off. ]])

    MSG([[ I lost the energy to chase her and stood rooted to the spot. I couldn’t chase her. I had no right to. ]])

    MSG([[ ――It was over. Everything was over. Everything. All of it. ]])

    MSG([[ My body went limp, and I collapsed where I stood. Normally, my mind would try to find a way out, but it was as if my battery had run out. ]])

    MSG([[ Because, when I think about it, this was the consequence of everything so far. ]])

    MSG([[ What honest feelings? I had been lying to Uran from the start to the very end. ]])

    MSG([[ No excuses. This was the just consequence I deserved. The natural ending for someone who deceived Uran more than anyone else. ]])

    MSG([[ It was only natural that I couldn’t find words to say to Uran. ]])

    MSG([[ I helplessly watched as the surrounding darkness deepened, unable to stand up. ]])

    -- 　　　　◆
STOP_BGM(1000)
LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "")
SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)
WAIT_INPUT(1000)

    ScenarioManager.Next("RYU_EP05_07")
end
